name: Amazon S3 Glacier
short: A secure, durable, and extremely low-cost storage service on AWS for data archiving and long-term backup.
description: Amazon S3 Glacier is a durable, secure, and cost-effective cloud storage service designed for long-term backup and data archiving. It provides three retrieval options to fit different access needs: expedited, standard, and bulk retrievals. Glacier supports compliance requirements and regulatory archives, and offers 99.999999999% durability. It integrates with S3 Lifecycle policies for automatic data transfers. With Glacier, businesses can store large amounts of data at a low cost, while maintaining easy, albeit slower, access.
